analyzed: sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as happy or suffering.🔽He does not see it as self or not self.🔽He does not see it as peaceful or not peaceful.🔽He does not see it as empty or not empty.

original: bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as with signs or signless.🔽He does not see it as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.🔽He does not see it as arising or ceasing.

original: zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as compounded or uncompounded.🔽He does not see it as in cyclic existence or beyond it.🔽He does not see it as in the world or beyond it.🔽He does not see it as in the conditioned or unconditioned.🔽He does not see it as in the past, future, or present.

original: stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as the perfection of generosity.🔽He does not see it as the perfection of ethical discipline, patient endurance, perseverance, meditative concentration, or wisdom.

analyzed: mtshan ma med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as the path.🔽He does not see it as the ten powers, fearlessnesses, detailed and thorough knowledges, or distinct

translated: They do not consider that the contact that is the union of nose, smells, and nose-consciousness is supramundane.

translated: They do not consider that the contact that is the union of nose, smells, and nose-consciousness is nirvāṇa.

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba mi dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider that the designation of the union of the three as ‘contact through the body’ is something virtuous.🔽They do not consider that the designation of the union of the three as ‘contact through the body’ is something non-virtuous.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider that the designation of the union of the three as ‘contact through the body’ is something that is reprehensible.🔽They do not consider that the designation of the union of the three as ‘contact through the body’ is something that is irreproachable.🔽They do not consider that the designation of the union of the three as ‘contact through the body’ is something that is with outflows.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba zag pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba zag pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider that the designation of the union of the three as ‘contact through the body’ is something that is without outflows.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the contact that is the coming together of the three as associated with defilement.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba @311a *//🔽'jig rten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba @311a *// 'jig rten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the contact that is the coming together of the three as free from defilement.🔽They do not see the contact that is the coming together of the three as worldly.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'khor bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'khor bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the contact that is the coming together of the three as other than worldly.🔽They do not see the contact that is the coming together of the three as saṃsāra.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo ////
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo ////
translated: They do not see the contact that is the coming together of the three as nirvāṇa.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: bam po bco lnga pa /
analyzed: bam po bco lnga pa /
translated: Chapter 15.

original: gang yang lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /🔽bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung zhes bya ba de'ang rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang yang lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am / bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung zhes bya ba de'ang rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: “They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as permanent.

original: mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as impermanent.

original: bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as happiness.

original: sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as suffering.🔽They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as a self.

original: bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as not a self.

original: zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as peaceful.

original: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as not peaceful.🔽They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as empty.

original: mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the condition of the body, tactile objects, and the contact of the body as not empty.

original: mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med par yang dag par rjes su mi @311b mthong ngo //🔽smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mtshan ma med par yang dag par rjes su mi @311b mthong ngo // smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as signless.🔽They do not see it as having aspirations.

original: smon pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'dus byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: smon pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'dus byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as lacking aspirations.🔽They do not see it as compounded.

original: 'dus ma byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as uncompounded.

original: kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as afflicted.

original: rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as purified.

original: skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as arising.🔽They do not see it as ceasing.

original: dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as secluded.

original: mi dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as not secluded.

original: dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see it as wholesome.

original: mi dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider it to be unwholesome.🔽He does not consider it to be with or without outflows.

original: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;kha na ma tho ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽zag pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;kha na ma tho ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // zag pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider it to be with or without outflows.🔽He does not consider it to be with or without afflictions.

analyzed: nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'jig rten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider it to be with or without afflictions.🔽He does not consider it to be worldly or supramundane.

analyzed: 'khor bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su @312a *//
translated: He does not consider it to be worldly or supramundane.🔽He does not consider it to be saṃsāra or nirvāṇa.

original: mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider it to be saṃsāra or nirvāṇa.

original: yid ces bya ba rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the mind to be permanent.

original: yid ces bya ba mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid ces bya ba bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid ces bya ba bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the mind as permanent or impermanent.

original: yid ces bya ba sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the mind as happiness or suffering.🔽They do not consider the mind as self or not self.🔽They do not consider the mind as pure or impure.🔽They do not consider the mind as empty or not empty.🔽They do not consider the mind as with signs or signless.

original: yid ces bya ba bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;yid ces bya ba bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;yid ces bya ba bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the mind as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.🔽They do not consider the mind as calm or not calm.🔽They do not consider the mind as void or not void.🔽They do not consider the mind as arising.🔽They do not consider the mind as ceasing.🔽They do not consider the mind as afflicted.

original: yid ces bya ba zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid ces bya ba ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid ces bya ba ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the mind as purified.🔽They do not consider the mind as born.🔽They do not consider the mind as passing away.🔽They do not consider the mind as produced.🔽They do not consider the mind as unproduced.🔽They do not consider the mind as destroyed.🔽They do not consider the mind as indestructible.🔽They do not consider the mind as empty.🔽They do not consider the mind as not empty.🔽They do not consider the mind as arising.🔽They do not consider the mind as ceasing.🔽They do not consider the mind as afflicted.

original: yid ces bya ba stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid ces bya ba mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid ces bya ba mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the mind as purified.🔽They do not consider the mind as past.🔽They do not consider the mind as future.🔽They do not consider the mind as present.🔽They do not consider the mind as internal.🔽They do not consider the mind as external.🔽They do not consider the mind as both.🔽They do not consider the mind as neither.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the aggregates.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the elements.

original: yid ces bya ba mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the mind as the basis of the sense sources.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.🔽They do not consider the mind as the basis of the world systems.

translated: They do not see the mind as having signs.🔽They do not see the mind as having aspirations.

analyzed: yid ces bya ba 'dus ma byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid ces bya ba kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the contact of mind to be nirvāṇa.

original: gang yang yid dang chos dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang yid dang chos dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /
translated: “He does not consider the contact of mind to be the condition for the experience of a pleasant,

original: sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: unpleasant, or neither pleasant nor unpleasant feeling.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung zhes bya @316b ba de'ang rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung zhes bya @316b ba de'ang rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as pleasant or unpleasant.

original: mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as permanent or impermanent.

original: sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as happy or suffering.🔽He does not see it as self or not self.🔽He does not see it as peaceful or not peaceful.🔽He does not see it as empty or not empty.

original: bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as with signs or signless.🔽He does not see it as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.🔽He does not see it as arising or ceasing.

original: zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as afflicted or purified.🔽He does not see it as increasing or decreasing.🔽He does not see it as produced or destroyed.🔽He does not see it as gone or not gone.🔽He does not see it as defiled or immaculate.

original: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as compounded or uncompounded.🔽He does not see it as in the past, future, or present.🔽He does not see it as internal or external.🔽He does not see it as small or large.🔽He does not see it as far or near.🔽He does not see it as form, feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.🔽He does not see it as eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.🔽He does not see it as forms, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, or mental phenomena.🔽He does not see it as the earth, water, fire, or wind elements.🔽He does not see it as the realm of desire, the realm of form, or the formless realm.🔽He does not see it as the perfection of generosity, the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as the perfection of skillful means, the perfection of aspiration, the perfection of strength, or the perfection of knowledge.🔽He does not see it as the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, or the noble eightfold path.🔽He does not see it as the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four special modes of knowledge, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not see it as the emptiness, signlessness, or wishlessness meditative stabilizations.

original: mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mtshan ma med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mtshan ma med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as the meditative stabilities, dhāraṇī gateways, or buddhas.🔽He

original: smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽smon pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;'dus byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // smon pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;'dus byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that it has aspirations,🔽nor that it is without aspirations. He does not consider that it is compounded,

original: 'dus ma byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: nor that it is uncompounded.

original: kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that it is afflicted,

original: rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: nor that it is purified.

original: skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that it arises,🔽nor that it ceases.🔽He does not consider that it is isolated,

original: mi dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: nor that it is not isolated.

original: dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that it is virtuous,🔽nor that it is nonvirtuous.

original: mi dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽kha @317a *// na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽kha @317a *// na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that it is faulty,🔽nor that it is faultless.

original: kha na ma tho ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽zag pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // zag pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as blameworthy or as not blameworthy.

original: nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'jig rten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'jig rten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as contaminated or as uncontaminated.

original: 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'khor bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'khor bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as belonging to the world or as transcending the world.🔽He does not see it as defiled or as purified.

original: mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see it as cyclic existence or as nirvana.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de 'dus byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de 'dus byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not see that perfection of wisdom, that bodhisattva, or the name ‘bodhisattva’ as existing in the compounded element.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see them as existing in the uncompounded element.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, if you ask why,

original: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste /
translated: it is because when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not conceptualize or falsely project any of those phenomena.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @317b pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos la gnas shing /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @317b pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos la gnas shing /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they abide in the nonconceptual Dharma.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom in order to cultivate the applications of mindfulness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Except for the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects, they do not see even the perfection of wisdom itself.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the name ‘perfection of wisdom.’ They do not see a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the name ‘bodhisattva.’

original: sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the name ‘buddha.’

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom in order to cultivate the right efforts.

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag @318a *// par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs pa yin te /

translated: “When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they have a thorough understanding of the defining characteristics of phenomena.

original: chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The defining characteristics of phenomena

original: kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: are not afflicted,

original: rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ming dang brdar bya ba'i @327a *//
analyzed: rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ming dang brdar bya ba'i @327a *//
translated: and they are not purified.

original: chos kyi gdags pa khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi gdags pa khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom in that way, they should understand the designation of phenomena as a nominal and conventional designation.

original: de ltar des ming dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa khong du chud nas gzugs la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de ltar des ming dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa khong du chud nas gzugs la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: In that way, when they understand the designation of phenomena as a nominal and conventional designation, they do not become attached to form,

original: tshor ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: tshor ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not become attached to feeling,

original: 'du shes la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'du shes la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not become attached to perception,

original: 'du byed la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not become attached to volitional factors,🔽and

original: rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to consciousness.

original: mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no attachment to the eye.

original: gzugs la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gzugs la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no attachment to form.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no attachment to eye consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽gang yang mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do // gang yang mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: There is no attachment to eye contact.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: And whatever feeling arises due to the condition of eye contact—whether pleasant, unpleasant, or neither unpleasant nor pleasant—there is no attachment to that.

original: rna ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no attachment to the ear.

original: sgra la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sgra la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no attachment to sound.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no attachment to ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no attachment to ear contact.

original: gang yang rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the nose, smells, and nose-consciousness.🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the tongue, tastes, and tongue-consciousness.🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the body, tactility, and body-consciousness.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the thinking-mind, thoughts, and thinking-mind-consciousness.

original: sna la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sna la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: “He does not become attached to the eye.

original: dri la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: dri la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He does not become attached to forms.

original: sna'i rnam @327b par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam @327b par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He does not become attached to eye-consciousness.🔽He does not become attached to the contact that is the union of the eye, forms, and eye-consciousness.🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the eye, forms, and eye-consciousness.🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the ear, sounds, and ear-consciousness.🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the nose, smells, and nose-consciousness.🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the tongue, tastes, and tongue-consciousness.

original: gang yang sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the body, tactility, and body-consciousness.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the feeling that arises in dependence on the union of the thinking-mind, thoughts, and thinking-mind-consciousness.

original: lce la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: lce la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: “He does not become attached to the tongue.

original: ro la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: ro la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He does not become attached to tastes.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽gang yang lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do // lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do // gang yang lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: He is not attached to the tongue consciousness.🔽He is not attached to the contact that is the meeting point of the three—tongue, taste, and tongue consciousness.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to the pleasant, unpleasant, or neutral feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the meeting point of the three—tongue, taste, and tongue consciousness.

original: lus la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: lus la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: “He is not attached to the body.

original: reg bya la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: reg bya la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to tactile objects.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to the body consciousness.🔽He is not attached to the contact that is the meeting point of the three—body, tactile objects, and body consciousness.

original: gang yang lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: He is not attached to the pleasant, unpleasant, or neutral feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the meeting point of the three—body, tactile objects, and body consciousness.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to the arising of a feeling that is neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: yid la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;chos la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: yid la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;chos la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to the mind.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to the contact that is the convergence of the three.

original: gang yang yid dang / chos @328a *//
analyzed: gang yang yid dang / chos @328a *//
translated: Whatever is the convergence of the mind,🔽phenomena, and mental consciousness,

original: dang; yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: dang; yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: the condition for the arising of a feeling that is pleasant,

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: unpleasant, or neither pleasant nor unpleasant, he is not attached to that.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to the conditioned element.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He is not attached to the unconditioned element.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the perfection of generosity. They are not attached to the perfection of conduct.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the perfection of insight.

original: de dag gi ming dang mtshan nyid la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de dag gi ming dang mtshan nyid la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the names and characteristics of those perfections.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lus la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lus la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the body of a bodhisattva.

original: sha'i mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sha'i mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the fleshly eye.

original: lha'i mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;shes rab kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;chos kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: lha'i mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;shes rab kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do; ;chos kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They are not attached to the divine eye. They are not attached to the eye of insight. They are not attached to the eye of Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to the eye of the Buddha,

original: mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to the perfection of clairvoyance,

original: nang stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur @328b ba med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur @328b ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to ultimate emptiness,🔽there is no attachment to conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to unconditioned emptiness,🔽there is no attachment to the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: there is no attachment to the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽They do not get attached to emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not get attached to the bases of supernatural powers.

original: dbang po rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags par @329a *//🔽'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags par @329a *// 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to the nine serial absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They do not become attached to signlessness.

original: smon pa med pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: smon pa med pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the absence of wishes;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the clairvoyances;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the meditative stabilizations;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the ten powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽byams pa chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba med do // byams pa chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the four detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽they do not get caught up in great love;

original: snying rje chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ma bco brgyad la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ma bco brgyad la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: de bzhin nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do //🔽yang dag pa'i mtha' la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do // yang dag pa'i mtha' la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in suchness;🔽they do not get caught up in the very limit of reality;

original: chos kyi dbyings la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get caught up in the dharma-constituent;

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la @329b chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la @329b chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get attached to bringing beings to maturity;

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get attached to purifying a buddhafield;

original: thabs mkhas pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: they do not get attached to skill in means.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar gang chags par byed pa'am /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gang chags par byed pa'am /
translated: Because all those dharmas which would get attached,

original: gang gis chags par bya ba'am /
analyzed: gang gis chags par bya ba'am /
translated: or by which one would get attached,

original: gang la chags par bya ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang la chags par bya ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or to which one would get attached, do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: increase the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: increase the perfection of morality,🔽increase the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: increase the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: They grow through the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: They grow through the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: They enter into the certainty of the bodhisattva.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro //
translated: They attain the stage of nonretrogression.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They perfect the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /
translated: Having perfected the superknowledges, they bring beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing /
translated: They serve and venerate the lord buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //🔽sangs rgyas @330a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //🔽sangs rgyas @330a *//
translated: and they go from buddhafield to buddhafield in order to purify a buddhafield and to behold the lord buddhas.🔽They are not separated from the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And having seen those Blessed Ones, the roots of virtue that they have dedicated to rebirth in the presence of those Blessed Ones will increase.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And by those roots of virtue they will be reborn in the presence of those Blessed Ones.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang thos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang thos par 'gyur te /
translated: And from those Blessed Ones they will hear the Dharma.

original: ji skad du thos pa'i chos de dag kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du thos pa'i chos de dag kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro // gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Dharma that they hear will not disappear until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.🔽They will attain the dhāraṇīs.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will attain the meditative stabilities.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ming dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa rnams de ltar khong du chud par bya'o ////
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ming dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa rnams de ltar khong du chud par bya'o ////
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should understand the designation of phenomena as names and conventional terms in that way.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu drug pa /
